question: The secondary oocyte retains bulk of the ______ rich cytoplasm of the primary oocyte.
The tertiary follicle further changes into the mature follicle or ______ follicle.
The secondary oocyte forms a new membrane called ______ surrounding it.
The Graafian follicle now ruptures to release the secondary oocyte from the ovary by the process called ______.
The reproductive cycle in the female primates is called ______ cycle.
The first menstruation begins at puberty and is called ______.
In human females, menstruation is repeated at an average interval of about ______ days.
The cycle of events starting from one menstruation till the next one is called the ______ cycle.
